TaskDescription.Detail: Create an Excel file, input data, designate a range, and use the Auto Sum shortcut key to calculate the total.

Assist.value: Create an Excel file in the project path 'Global.ProjectDir+this.filename'.
Enter the project path 'Global.ProjectDir+this.filename'.
Execute the created Excel file in the project path 'Global.ProjectDir'.
Enter the Excel file path, 'Global.ProjectDir+this.filename'.
Enter the pre-generated data 'this.data' in the Excel file.
Enter 'ACTIVE_EXCEL' as the target Excel file to enter the value. 'ACTIVE_EXCEL' means the currently active Excel document.
Enter the pre-generated data 'this.data'.
Enter cell 'A1' where you want to start entering data.
Specifies the range for autosum.
Enter 'ACTIVE_EXCEL' as the target Excel file to enter the value. 'ACTIVE_EXCEL' means the currently active Excel document.
Enter the range 'A1:D4' for autosum.
Enter a shortcut key in an Excel document.
Enter 'ACTIVE_EXCEL' as the target Excel file to enter the value. 'ACTIVE_EXCEL' means the currently active Excel document.
Enable for AutoSum shortcut.
Enter the shortcut 'hus' for auto-sum.
Wait for 3 seconds to reflect the shortcut key.
Enter '3' for the time (seconds) to reflect the shortcut key.
Close the Excel document.
Delete the created Excel file.
Enter the path to the Excel file to be deleted 'Global.ProjectDir+this.filename'.
